member.name: P:CSharpKit.Windows.Anchoring.Themes.Controls.SplineBorder.Thickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the Thickness property. This dependency property indicates the border thickness.

member.name: P:CSharpKit.Windows.Anchoring.Themes.Controls.SplineBorder.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the Fill property. This dependency property indicates the fill color.

member.name: P:CSharpKit.Windows.Anchoring.Themes.Controls.SplineBorder.Stroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the Stroke property. This dependency property indicates the stroke brush.

member.name: P:CSharpKit.Windows.Anchoring.Themes.Controls.SplineBorder.BottomBorderMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets the BottomBorderMargin property. This dependency property indicates the adjustment for the bottom margin.
